item.title: The Danger of a Single Story
item.description: I think a lot of people can relate to this. http://www.ted.com/talks/lang/por_pt/chimamanda_adichie_the_danger_of_a_single_story.html From an Indian perspective, I think this is definitely worth passing on to those who make a big deal of stories like Slum Dog Millionaire.

item.title: Home Remedies from south India: Cancer
item.description: This is a continuation of the series which started with Hair Care. The other posts covered Eye care, Coughs, Digestive disorders, Head aches, and Skin care among other topics.
